Synopsis:
Paul Conroy (Ryan Reynolds), lorry-driver and father, wakes up buried alive in an old wooden coffin. Without knowing who may have put him there and why, has only spent half a mobile phone to try to escape his agonizing nightmare. Poor coverage, battery and oxygen shortages are the worst obstacles in a life or death race against time: Paul only has 90 minutes to achieve the rescue.

Production notes:
- Winner of Best Film award at the Sixth SPANISH edition of the Copa de Cine 'The Seventh Art "(2010).
